title: US military leans into megaconstellations after their “resiliency” in Ukraine
summary: "Having a megaconstellation, quite frankly, frustrates our adversaries."

title: Ancient River Is Helping NASA's Perseverance Mars Rover Do Its Work
summary: The six-wheeled geologist is getting some assistance in its in search for diverse rock samples that could be brought to Earth for deeper investigation.

title: PlanetiQ wins $60 million NOAA contract
summary: PlanetiQ won it’s first order for operational radio occultation data to feed numerical weather models.

title: Op-ed | Britain has all the attributes to create a world-leading space economy
summary: The space sector is experiencing significant growth globally, but Britain’s part in forging the future of the space ecosystem still remains relatively unknown.

title: Space RCO backs Hyperspace Challenge 2023 accelerator
summary: Hyperspace Challenge is joining forces for the first time with the Space Force Rapid Capabilities Office to help make space assets more resilient.

title: Insurers brace for ViaSat-3 claim
summary: The potential failure of a Viasat broadband satellite could result in a massive claim and a “huge hit” for the space insurance sector, one insurer warns.

title: China’s LandSpace Zhuque-2 Rocket wins methane-fueled rocket race

title: Venezuela Joins China's International Lunar Research Station
summary: Venezuela has become the 5th country to officially joined the International Lunar Research Station (ILRS), a China-led initiative. The ILRS is considered a parallel project to NASA's Artemis Program and aims to establish a permanent lunar base in the 2030s.

title: Rocket Lab launch enables Telesat to restart LEO demonstrations
summary: Telesat is preparing to resume demonstrations for its delayed low Earth orbit broadband constellation after Rocket Lab successfully launched the Canadian operator’s latest prototype satellite.

title: Venezuela signs up to China’s moon base initiative
summary: Venezuela has formally joined the China-led International Lunar Research Station project.
